titles.title: A resolution appointing a committee to notify the President concerning the proposed adjournment of the session.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 12/1/1994--Introduced. Provides for a committee of Senators to join a similar committee of the House of Representatives to notify the President that the two Houses have completed their business and are ready to adjourn.
